titleStmt.title: Enneades arithmeticæ, the numbring nines, or, Pythagoras his table extended to all whole numbers under 10000 and the numbring rods of the Right Honourable John Lord Nepeer : enlarged with 9999 fixt columns or rods, of single, double, triple, and quadruple figures, and with a new sort of double and moveable rods, for the much more sure, plain and easie performance of multiplication, division, and extraction of roots ...
titleStmt.author: Napier, John, 1550-1617.
Pythagoras.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
